title: PBE Skins aren't Updated
body: New to the PBE, is there a reason why the skins aren't updated whatsoever. It says for me, the latest skin released is the star galaxy fizz, kindred, ect...

replies.body:
They should still be in the store.
I know the welcome screen is out of date though (but that doesn't affect much).
The welcome screen often isn't updated, but all skins should be located in the store under skins, in order of release.
Also having this issue. Newest skins are Taliyah and the super galaxy line.
